title.rendered: DXB Fashion Week  Partnering with 24Fashion TV

content.rendered:
24Fashion TV proudly announces its media sponsorship of the upcoming DXB Fashion Week coming in December 2021.

DXB Fashion Week is the new born fashion platform that was created by the collaboration of 3 international fashion and beauty organizations. Catwalk International of Dubai catwalk.international, with Cosmodels of Sweden cosmdels.se and The World Union Academy of Cosmotelogy (International Organization).

DXBFW aims to provide a new and creative platform for new and established designers and brands to showcase their latest collections to the right audience and media. DXBFW will welcoming designers and brands from all over the world to our beloved and beautiful city, Dubai the city of everything that is new, fashionable, and elegant!

DXBFW will also include Fashion Talks and Beauty Forums, as well as an Exhibition.

https://www.dxbfashionweek.com
